FBS_TESTSEN (ENUM)
FBS_TESTSEN (ENUM)
Â¶
TYPE FBS_TESTSEN :
Definition of SF_TestableSafetySensor function block states and its diagnostic values.
Attributes:
qualified_only
InOut:
Name
Initial
Comment
IDLE
16#0
The function block is not active (initial state).
INIT
16#8401
An activation has been detected by the FB.
ESPE_INTERRUPTED_1
16#8802
The FB has detected a safety demand. The switch has not been
automatically tested yet.
WAIT_FOR_RESET_1
16#8402
Wait for rising trigger of Reset after state 8802.
EXT_FUNC_TEST
16#8002
The automatic sensor test was faulty. An external manual sensor test is necessary.
The support for the necessary external manual sensor test has been acti-vated at the FB (NoExternalTest = FALSE).
A negative signal edge at the sensor is required.
ESPE_ESPE_INTERRUPT_EXTTEST
16#8804
The automatic sensor test was faulty. An external manual sensor test is necessary.
The support FOR the necessary external manual sensor test has been activated at the FB (NoExternalTest = FALSE). A TRUE signal at the sensor is required
END_EXTTEST
16#8404
The automatic sensor test was faulty. An external manual sensor test is necessary. The support for the necessary external manual sensor test has been acti-vated at the FB (NoExternalTest = FALSE).
The external manual test is complete. The FB detected a complete sensor switching cycle (external controlled).
ESPE_FREE_NO_TEST
16#8010
The FB has not detected a safety demand. The sensor has not
been tested automatically.
ESPE_INTERRUPTED_2
16#8806
The FB has detected a safety demand. The switch was
automatically tested.
WAIT_FOR_RESET_2
16#8406
Wait for rising trigger of Reset after state 8812
TEST_REQUEST
16#8020
The automatic sensor test is active. Test Timer is started first time. The transmitter signal of the sensor is switched off by the FB.
The signal of the receiver must follow the signal of the transmitter.
TEST_ACTIVE
16#8030
The automatic sensor test is active. Test Timer is started second time. The transmitter signal of the sensor is switched on by the FB.
The signal of the receiver must follow the signal of the transmitter.
ESPE_FREE_TEST_OK
16#8000
The FB has not detected a safety demand. The sensor was
automatically tested.
ERR_PARAMETER
16#C000
Invalid value at the TestTime parameter. Values between 0 ms
and 150 ms are possible.
ERR_RESET_1
16#C001
Static Reset condition detected after FB activation.
ERR_RESET_2
16#C011
Static Reset condition detected in state 8403.
ERR_RESET_3
16#C021
Static Reset condition detected in state Cx10.
ERR_RESET_4
16#C031
Static Reset condition detected in state 8406.
ERR_RESET_5
16#C041
Static Reset condition detected in state C000.
ERR_RESET_6
16#C051
Static Reset condition detected in state 8413.
ERR_TEST_1
16#C010
Test time elapsed in state 8020 or 8030. NOT (S_OSSD_IN =
TRUE AND NoExternalTest = TRUE)
ERR_TEST_2
16#C410
Test time elapsed in state 8020 or 8030. S_OSSD_IN = TRUE
AND NoExternalTest = TRUE

rows.Name: IDLE
rows.Comment: The function block is not active (initial state).

rows.Name: INIT
rows.Comment: An activation has been detected by the FB.

rows.Name: ESPE_INTERRUPTED_1
rows.Comment:
The FB has detected a safety demand. The switch has not been
automatically tested yet.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_RESET_1
rows.Comment: Wait for rising trigger of Reset after state 8802.

rows.Name: EXT_FUNC_TEST
rows.Comment:
The automatic sensor test was faulty. An external manual sensor test is necessary.
The support for the necessary external manual sensor test has been acti-vated at the FB (NoExternalTest = FALSE).
A negative signal edge at the sensor is required.

rows.Name: ESPE_ESPE_INTERRUPT_EXTTEST
rows.Comment:
The automatic sensor test was faulty. An external manual sensor test is necessary.
The support FOR the necessary external manual sensor test has been activated at the FB (NoExternalTest = FALSE). A TRUE signal at the sensor is required

rows.Name: END_EXTTEST
rows.Comment:
The automatic sensor test was faulty. An external manual sensor test is necessary. The support for the necessary external manual sensor test has been acti-vated at the FB (NoExternalTest = FALSE).
The external manual test is complete. The FB detected a complete sensor switching cycle (external controlled).

rows.Name: ESPE_FREE_NO_TEST
rows.Comment:
The FB has not detected a safety demand. The sensor has not
been tested automatically.

rows.Name: ESPE_INTERRUPTED_2
rows.Comment:
The FB has detected a safety demand. The switch was
automatically tested.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_RESET_2
rows.Comment: Wait for rising trigger of Reset after state 8812

rows.Name: TEST_REQUEST
rows.Comment:
The automatic sensor test is active. Test Timer is started first time. The transmitter signal of the sensor is switched off by the FB.
The signal of the receiver must follow the signal of the transmitter.

rows.Name: TEST_ACTIVE
rows.Comment:
The automatic sensor test is active. Test Timer is started second time. The transmitter signal of the sensor is switched on by the FB.
The signal of the receiver must follow the signal of the transmitter.

rows.Name: ESPE_FREE_TEST_OK
rows.Comment:
The FB has not detected a safety demand. The sensor was
automatically tested.

rows.Name: ERR_PARAMETER
rows.Comment:
Invalid value at the TestTime parameter. Values between 0 ms
and 150 ms are possible.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_1
rows.Comment: Static Reset condition detected after FB activation.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_2
rows.Comment: Static Reset condition detected in state 8403.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_3
rows.Comment: Static Reset condition detected in state Cx10.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_4
rows.Comment: Static Reset condition detected in state 8406.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_5
rows.Comment: Static Reset condition detected in state C000.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_6
rows.Comment: Static Reset condition detected in state 8413.

rows.Name: ERR_TEST_1
rows.Comment:
Test time elapsed in state 8020 or 8030. NOT (S_OSSD_IN =
TRUE AND NoExternalTest = TRUE)

rows.Name: ERR_TEST_2
rows.Comment:
Test time elapsed in state 8020 or 8030. S_OSSD_IN = TRUE
AND NoExternalTest = TRUE
